title: Textured Whimsy
description: Ce style capture le charme des illustrations contemporaines de livres pour enfants en utilisant une approche technique mixte de crayons de couleur, de gouache sèche et de craies de cire. Il présente une perspective naïve et plate avec des textures grattées visibles, des traits organiques et une esthétique chaleureuse faite à la main.
prompt: A charming, highly textured mixed-media illustration of {{subject}} rendered in the whimsical style of a modern children's book. The artwork simulates the tactile look of dry gouache layered with colored pencils and wax crayons on rough-grain paper. The rendering technique focuses on visible stroke marks, scratchy cross-hatching for shading, and organic, uneven outlines that emphasize a hand-drawn feel. The perspective is flattened and stylized, rejecting photorealism in favor of a naive, folk-art aesthetic with simplified geometric forms and exaggerated proportions. The color palette is warm and inviting, utilizing a dominant wash of {{primary_color}} to set the mood, punctuated by vibrant details in {{accent_color}}. The lighting is flat and ambient, avoiding harsh shadows to maintain a soft, illustrative quality. Textures are grainy and matte, mimicking the imperfections of traditional analog art supplies. The overall atmosphere is playful, creative, and cozy, evoking a sense of storytelling and artisanal craft. illustration, naive art, textured paper, visible strokes, dry brush, matte finish, soft edges, folk art aesthetic, highly detailed texture, 4k, artistic, creative, joyful, colored pencil drawing, flat design.
background_prompt: A textured, illustrative background scene depicting a cozy environment or abstract wall filled with hand-drawn details. The scene uses {{primary_color}} as the base tone with scribbled patterns and organic shapes in {{accent_color}}. The rendering mimics dry gouache and crayon on rough paper, featuring flat perspective, scattered background elements like posters or plants, and a grainy, matte surface texture without any main subject.
description_en: This style captures the charm of contemporary children's book illustrations using a mixed-media approach of colored pencils, dry gouache, and wax crayons. It features a naive, flat perspective with visible scratchy textures, organic strokes, and a cozy, hand-drawn aesthetic.
description_fr: Ce style capture le charme des illustrations contemporaines de livres pour enfants en utilisant une approche technique mixte de crayons de couleur, de gouache sèche et de craies de cire. Il présente une perspective naïve et plate avec des textures grattées visibles, des traits organiques et une esthétique chaleureuse faite à la main.
